data.title: Hungary, Slovakia Can Deal With Lukoil Sanctions: Oil Strategy
data.meta_description: Hungary and Slovakia are complaining hard about Ukrainian sanctions that are depriving them of crude supply from Moscow-based oil producer Lukoil PJSC.
data.text:
Hungary and Slovakia are complaining hard about Ukrainian sanctions that are depriving them of crude supply from Moscow-based oil producer Lukoil PJSC.

It might be commercially challenging for them to do so, but they can cope easily when it comes to the actual flow of crude to their refineries, writes Bloomberg oil strategist Julian Lee.
